content.title: Jharkhand Nirman Karmakar Mrityu/Durghatana Sahayata Yojana
content.department: Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development, Govt. of Jharkhand
content.beneficiary: Registered Construction Workers (Nirman Shramik / Nirman Karmakar)
content.details: 'Jharkhand Nirman Karmakar Mrityu/Durghatana Sahayata Yojana' is an Insurance Scheme by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development Govt of Jharkhand. The scheme is also known as the 'Jharkhand Construction Worker Death/Accident Assistance Scheme' in English. This is a 100% State Sponsored Scheme. Only the residents/domicile of the state of Jharkhand can apply to this scheme. The applications for this scheme are accepted online through the official website of the department (http://shramadhan.jharkhand.gov.in). The scheme provides social security to all registered workers in the age group of 18-60 years.
benefits: In case of death in an accident, ₹ 5,00,000/-
In case of complete disability in an accident, ₹ 3,00,000/-
In case of partial disability in an accident, ₹ 2,00,000/-
eligibility: The applicant should be a domicile in the state of Jharkhand.
The applicant should be a registered Construction Worker (Nirman Shramik / Nirman Karmakar).
The applicant should be in the age group of 18-60 years.
The applicant should have worked for at least 90 days.
documents_required: Death Certificate (in the case of normal death or death in an accident)
Disability Certificate (in the case of complete/partial disability)
Proof of Age / Date of Birth
Proof of Registration as a Construction Worker

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Grant Payable In The Case Of Death In An Accident?
faqs.answer: In case of death in an accident, ₹ 5,00,000/- shall be payable.

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Grant Payable In The Case Of Complete Disability In An Accident?
faqs.answer: In case of complete disability in an accident, ₹ 3,00,000/- shall be payable.

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Grant Payable In The Case Of Partial Disability In An Accident?
faqs.answer: In case of partial disability in an accident, ₹ 2,00,000/- shall be payable.

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Grant Payable In The Case Of Normal Death?
faqs.answer: In case of normal death, ₹ 1,00,000/- shall be payable.

faqs.question: Which Department Manages This Scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme is managed by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development, Govt. of Jharkhand.

faqs.question: Is This Scheme State Sponsored Or Centrally Sponsored?
faqs.answer: This scheme is a 100% State Sponsored Scheme.

faqs.question: Can Women Also Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is open to applicants from all genders.

faqs.question: Does This Scheme Accept Offline Applications?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme only accepts online applications.

faqs.question: Is There Any Application Fee?
faqs.answer: No. The entire application process is completely free of cost.

faqs.question: How Do I Track The Status Of My Application?
faqs.answer: To track the status of your application, follow the stepwise process given below: Step 1: Once submitted, the application goes for 3-level approval: Clerk > Labour Superintendent > DLC. Step 2: Go to Services > BOC Scheme Benefit > Application Status. Step 3: On the next page, fill in your Application ID, and click 'Search'. The status of your application will be displayed in a tabular format.
